price: 2. Waxaan kuugu soo dejinnay (Nabiyow) Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) si Xaq ah. Ee caabud Allaah Keliya, adigoo u daacad ah aan waxba la wadaajin cibaadada.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi fa-uʿ'budi al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
